value:
It's strange. I feel like you are a
part of me—as if we have been
together forever.

I am no Hero-King. I only stopped
the war thanks to my many allies.

Thank you for everything you do for
us. If ever you find yourself in
need, I want you to rely on us.

This world is beautiful... It reminds
me of my own homeland.

I cannot allow a single one of my
friends to die. Together, you and I,
with everyone else, will win this war.

Pardon the intrusion. I was
asked to come say hello
by $Nf.

Let this be a ray of hope that lights
the way for others!

I shall do my best to always
improve.

My apologies. It seems I am not
myself today.

May I help end the fighting with this
ray of hope.

I am Marth, Prince of Altea. It is
good to make your acquaintance.
Like you, I desire peace above all.

Over all the battles we've fought
together, I have come to see my
own powerlessness.$k$pAs but one, I cannot accomplish
anything. Together, we can face
everything.$k$pThat is why having you at my side
gives me courage beyond the
telling of it.$k$pI shall continue to fight at your
side as long as you will allow me.$k$pI am eternally grateful that we
may count on one another.
せいっ
はあっ
うっ
うわああ！
My prayers are with you.
Forgive me.
I must end you.
Fate has brought us here.
Farewell...
Heh
What's wrong? And how may I help?
I admire how you lead your troops in battle.
You, too, are blessed with wonderful allies.
The circlet I wear? A gift from...someone dear to me.
It seems every world is war torn...
I don't want anyone to die. Surely you feel the same way.
I enjoy this time with you. My troubles seem to melt away.
Understood.
Together.
As you say.
If you will allow me, I can be your strength.
